import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Button, Card, Grid, Image, Segment} from "semantic-ui-react"; import './CustomerWelcomeP.css' import {Auth} from "aws-amplify"; import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; export default function CustomerWelcomeP({customerLogout}) { const navigate = useNavigate(); async function handleLogout(){ const user = await Auth.signOut(); customerLogout(user) localStorage.clear(); await Auth.signOut() navigate("/") } return (
